/*input
3
120 75
128 16
7 8
*/
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define For(i,a,b)	for(int i=(a),_b=(b);i<=_b;++i)
#define nenezsnp	cout<<"I LOVE NENE"<<'\n'
#define int long long
using namespace std;

int f(int x,int y){
	if (x < y) swap (x,y);
	if (y==0) return x;
	return f(y,x%y);
}
main(){
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	//nenezsnp;
	int test;cin>>test;
	while (test-->0){
	int a,b;	cin>>a>>b; 
	int gcd = f(a,b);	a = a/gcd; b = b/gcd;

	while (f(b,gcd) != 1){
		b/=f(b,gcd);
	}
	if (b == 1)	cout << "Yes\n"; else cout << "No\n";
}
}
